president.name: Nikhil Naidu
president.description: Nikhil previously served as Masti's vice-president during the 2014-2015 school year, during which time he led Masti to a 2nd place finish at Penn State's Infusion and a Bollywood America bid. He was also Masti's show chair during the 2013-2014 school year.

vicePresident.name: Egg Patel
vicePresident.description: Eshani Patel, known to many as Egg Patel, previously served as one of Masti's show chairs during the 2013-2014 school year. In her free time, she likes to explore new cereals and hang out with her forest friends.

treasurer.name: Michelle Nie
treasurer.description: Michelle also served as Penn Masti's treasurer during the 2014-2015 school year.

outreachInternal.name: Gagan Goopta
outreachInternal.description: Gagan Goopta is Masti's internal outreach chair, dealing with on-campus performances and competitions.

outreachExternal.name: RATHMAN IHM
outreachExternal.description: Please contact Rathman with any inquiries regarding climbing trees or picking corn. He is a pioneer in the field.
